Partners.title: Become a partner of Klub Ada
Partners.description: Partnering with Klub Ada offers the opportunity to collaborate on shaping events and promotional activities. Cooperation provides access to a community that brings together women with varying levels of knowledge and experience in technology.

join.title: Interested in collaborating?
join.write_to_us: For more information, you can write to us at

why.title: Why become a partner?
why.description: We believe that connection is key to growth and success. Our efforts to encourage women in technology wouldnâ€™t be possible without the support of partners who share our values and vision.
why.description2: Our mission is to create an inclusive environment for women in technology by organizing live events, coding hours, book clubs, educational content, mentoring, Discord community, and more.
why.benefits_title: With partnership you can gain the following:
benefits: Creating a positive impact on society.

Activities.title: Activities
Activities.description: Read about all the activities we offer.

AboutUs.title: We inspire women in technology and support them on their career path.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: To inspire women in technology and provide them with support and resources to develop skills, network and grow in their careers.
mission.description: Our activities are designed to create a safe and encouraging environment where participants can share ideas, experiences, and engage in conversations.

story.title: The story of our beginning
story.subtitle: Klub Ada was born out of a desire to connect women in a field where we are often a minority, which brings unique challenges and dilemmas.
story.description: Because of these experiences, we often feel as if we don't belong in this space. With our activities, we want to emphasize that technology is a place where we are welcome and where our voices matter.

name.title: Where does the name Klub Ada come from?
name.subtitle: We found inspiration in Ada Lovelace â€” a pioneer of computing, mathematician, writer, and the first programmer.
name.description: In the 19th century, she wrote the first algorithm for Charles Babbageâ€™s Analytical Engine, the predecessor of the modern computer. Ada Lovelace is proof that women have been shaping technology from the very beginning, and her impact continues to inspire us today as we build the future together.

Discord.title: Join our community
Discord.description: Our Discord platform is a safe space to exchange ideas, interesting topics, events, useful resources, and opportunities for personal and career development.

Hero.title: A community of women in technology
Hero.description: Klub Ada organizes events aimed at networking and knowledge sharing, career and personal development for high school students, university students, professionals, and anyone interested in technology.

Events.title: Events
Events.description: Join us at informal gatherings where we discuss various career and technical topics, host experts from the industry, and socialize and exchange ideas in a relaxed atmosphere with snacks and drinks.

Footer.title: A community of women in technology
Footer.description_discord: A safe space for exchanging ideas, events, job opportunities and opportunities for personal and career development.

newsletter.description: By subscribing to our newsletter, youâ€™ll receive invitations to upcoming events and event summaries, useful tips, links to other helpful resources like hackathons, career events, job opportunities, and more.

challenges.1: AI-powered learning assistant for the visually impaired

call_to_action.title: Join us and solve real world challenges!
call_to_action.description: Come meet like minded people, connect with companies in the center of the tech scene in Slovenia, and build something new.

treasure_hunt.title: Treasure hunt
treasure_hunt.description: To make the wait for the hackathon go by faster, we have prepared a Treasure Hunt for you! Our duck has left behind coded messages scattered across our social media, posts, and website instead of footprints. Find 5 messages, decode them, and enter the complete password in the field below!
treasure_hunt.success: Congratulations, hacker - you have discovered the secret of Ada Duck! Come to the hackathon and tell us the password to receive a special prize.

puzzle_1.hint_1: Browse through our Instagram posts and find the one with frequently asked questions and answers. The first part of the password might be hidden there.
puzzle_1.hint_2: Try decrypting the puzzle password using Morse code.

puzzle_2.hint_1: Remember our 'this or that' video on Instagram? Maybe something is hidden in the post description?
puzzle_2.hint_2: Have you ever heard of A1Z26 encryption? Try using it to decrypt the puzzle password.

puzzle_3.hint_1: Take a look at our AdaHack highlights on Instagram and find the clue in the story about the tickets being sold out.
puzzle_3.hint_2: Not quite sure how to solve the puzzle? Maybe the answer is hidden in ASCII codes.

puzzle_4.hint_1: If youâ€™re having trouble finding the clue, look more closely through our hackathon website (hack.klub-ada.si).
puzzle_4.hint_2: The password is a bit shy, so you can only find it on a computer.
puzzle_4.hint_3: Use your mouse to help you uncover the clue that's floating in the middle-bottom part of our site!

puzzle_5.hint_1: On the Instagram or YouTube channel of Klub Ada, find the video with highlights from the 2023 hackathon we organized and check if the code is nearby.
puzzle_5.hint_2: For the final puzzle, we used the ROT5 cipher â€” if you get stuck, you can always ask ChatGPT for help.
puzzle_5.hint_3: F = A  G = B and so on...
